entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 1:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
